Title: Maximum Security
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Laura McCreary, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: With Adrian off the grid and in hiding, the rest of the squad scramble to track down the sister of Figgis, the mobster behind the operation, and throw a fake funeral to flush out Figgis' hit man.
